short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Double click a word or select a phrase to retrieve Urdu meanings

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this chrome extension you can select a word or phrase on any website to retrieve its Urdu meanings and definition. The extension is powered by readersenglish.com the best online Urdu dictionary. This extension can be disabled on selected websites.
